title: anja varuvadum uNDO
sahitya:
anja varuvadum uNDO AnmA nAnenum Ananda sundarar


anupallavi

  nanjum vALum nALum kOLum naragum en sheyyum
namban emmAn aruLin munnE namanum en sheyyum


caraNam    kAr mEghattaik-kATrum anjumO kadirai iruTTu vizhungumO
kaDalai uppu karaittuNDiDumO kanala shUDan erikkumO
Arvam koNDa anbarai enrum Ashai aNugudalAmO
AghAyattil aDi vaittu naDakkum Anavap-pittanumuNDO
arindu teLinda sama yOgattil amarnda vIra dhIrarukkum
